info.name: fract ( XOR / n )
info.description:
effect of bitwise operators XOR, AND, OR once divided by:
    left:  pow of 2 (i.e. direct content)   
    right: non-power of 2

try also: i*i , i*i*i
Strange how Xor "hashes" into circuit-like patterns.
See also [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/ttscR

renderpass.name: Image
